title: Question 102:
description: How can I take out a synth loan?

fields.title: Answer
fields.value:
sUSD and sETH loans can be taken currently at no interest on https://synthetix.exchange/#/loans
Although need to highlight that users will need to be close these loans core-contributors announce the end of this program and the upgrade to new loan contracts. Please refer to the blog posts below for more information:
- [blog](https://blog.synthetix.io/ether-collateral-trial-susd/) 
- [second blog](https://blog.synthetix.io/ether-collateral-second-trial/)
